verbose_text: Silencing ANX A1 with shRNA significantly inhibited the phosphorylation of extracellular signal regulated kinase 1/2 and the expression of differentiation associated genes (including runt related transcription factor 2, osteopontin and osteocalcin) during osteogenesis and resulted in reduced differentiation of BM-MSCs.
evidence: Silencing ANX A1 with shRNA significantly inhibited the phosphorylation of extracellular signal-regulated kinase
